content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Top 5 reasons the candidate would be interested in joining EPAM Capital Market Competency Center:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You get a chance to collaborate with exceptionally skilled, knowledgeable and mission-driven people who are experts in financial services: asset management, brokerage, banking.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Through our challenging projects for Barclays Capital, CITI Bank, UBS, MICEX and many others leading consumers we develop our people and support them to reach their greatest career goals.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Our systematic trainings in FIX, order flow, algorithmic trading and many others financial areas run by internal and internal experts develop our team and keep it growing.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We provide innovative solutions and use cutting edge technologies. Joining us you get a chance to transform your complex and creative ideas into reality.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Life is not just about career and making money. It is about building friendships and having fun. You get a chance toÂ have so much fun working in our friendly environment and sharing your ideas with our talented team located in Europe, USA , Asia.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Requirements\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":733250,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51b0889a-bace-41e4-9e1e-9bb81beb5fe0/Recruitment.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/51b0889a-bace-41e4-9e1e-9bb81beb5fe0/Recruitment.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Recruitment.pdf\",\"name\":\"Recruitment.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"51b0889a-bace-41e4-9e1e-9bb81beb5fe0\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
